attributes.action: make life imprisonment mean LIFE imprisonment & foreign prisoners to be deported
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Life imprisonment should mean life, and not 25 years or so.  If someones life is taken, the murderers life should be taken from them too and not be able to carry on their life after a sentance.

Foreign prisoners should be deported after their sentences.  They're here to have a better quality of life, if they abuse the hospitality we give them then they don't deserve to be here at all.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
